messages.text:
Topic	A short nature documentary exploring the beauty of forests and wildlife.
Audience	General viewers interested in nature and relaxation.
Music Theme	Calming ambient sounds with gentle nature-inspired music.
Video Length	Approximately 30 seconds (short-form documentary style).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, featuring a narrated overview of forest ecosystems, wildlife, and conservation tips.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	One adult narrator avatar: a friendly, middle-aged explorer in casual outdoor attire.
Voice	Adult male voice with a neutral American accent, warm and engaging tone.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of serene forest scenes, animals, and natural landscapes.
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

Of course. I've updated the plan to feature a female narrator.

Topic	A short nature documentary exploring the beauty of forests and wildlife.
Audience	General viewers interested in nature and relaxation.
Music Theme	Calming ambient sounds with gentle nature-inspired music.
Video Length	Approximately 30 seconds (short-form documentary style).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, featuring a narrated overview of forest ecosystems, wildlife, and conservation tips.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	One adult narrator avatar: a friendly, middle-aged female explorer in casual outdoor attire.
Voice	Adult female voice with a neutral American accent, warm and engaging tone.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of serene forest scenes, animals, and natural landscapes.
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

You've reached the limit for Video Agent. To keep creating, you can add Generative Credits or switch to Unlimited Mode. Unlimited Mode only utilizes stock HeyGen Public Avatars and media from the HeyGen library.

The video generation failed because the plan exceeded your Unlimited Plan limits. I have modified the plan to make it compliant.

Here is the updated plan:

Topic	A short nature documentary exploring the beauty of forests and wildlife.
Audience	General viewers interested in nature and relaxation.
Music Theme	Calming ambient sounds with gentle nature-inspired music.
Video Length	Approximately 30 seconds (short-form documentary style).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, featuring a narrated overview of forest ecosystems, wildlife, and conservation tips.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	Generic female avatar.
Voice	Generic female voice.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of serene forest scenes, animals, and natural landscapes.
Captions	Enabled.

I changed the avatar from a specific custom description to a "generic female avatar" and the voice from a custom tone to a "generic female voice" to comply with the Unlimited Plan rules. Does this modified plan work for you?
